Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.utils.Parser
  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a parser that can serialize and deserialize objects Hides which library is used

        public <T> T deserialize​(java.io.Reader reader,
                         java.lang.Class<T> classOfT)
        This method deserializes the file read from the specified reader into an object of the specified class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the desired object
        Parameters:
        reader - the reader producing the char sequence from which the object is to be deserialized.
        classOfT - the class of T
        Returns:
        an object of type T from the string.
